dict.acceptation: 打扰，妨碍；使骚动；使不安，使烦恼；妨碍睡眠（休息等）；

sent.orig: Don't disturb the presents on the table.
She told her boy not to stamp on the floor and disturb the sleeping baby.
sent.trans: 她叫她的男孩不要在地板上走得太响，以免惊扰睡着的婴孩。

sent.orig: Don't disturb them, the chairman is having a detailed conversation with some people.
sent.trans: 不要打扰他们，主席正在跟人在里面房间详谈。

sent.orig: This sharp vivacity of soul, and the supple and restless volubility attending it, disturb our negotiations.
sent.trans: 才思太过敏捷，锋芒过于显露，是人与人之间沟通交流的一大障碍。

sent.orig: They took the phone off the hook so no calls would disturb them.
sent.trans: 他们摘下电话听筒，以免电话打扰他们。
